thread.title: Vacuum tube train to travel at speed of sound

title: Vacuum tube train to travel at speed of sound
text:
Facebook: our app is draining your phones Published at 12:01AM, October 24 2015 
Facebook has admitted that its app had been draining iPhone batteries at an accelerated rate but insisted that tthe problem had been fixed Robot can detect facial signs of depression Published at 12:01AM, October 23 2015 
The technology can categorise expressions by looking at 68 facial markers, including the shape of the lips and eyebrows It’s the end of inflight movies Published at 12:01AM, October 22 2015

Powers that give MI5, MI6 and GCHQ a ‘dizzying’ range of electronic surveillance capabilities are to be laid out in the investigatory powers bill Find
